A web application that compares board game prices from UK retailers and BoardGameGeek marketplace.

## Features
- Search any board game by name
- Compare prices from 60+ UK stores
- Show BGG marketplace listings (UK only)
- Filter out out-of-stock items
- Real-time price data

## How to Use
1. Visit the website
2. Enter any board game name
3. View prices from UK retailers and BGG marketplace
4. Click "View" buttons to purchase

## Technologies Used
- Node.js + Express backend
- BoardGameGeek XML API
- BoardGamePrices.co.uk API
- Vanilla JavaScript frontend
